text: James Begg (1808–1883) was a Scottish minister. James Begg may also refer to: *James T. Begg (1877–1963), American politician in Ohio *James Livingstone Begg (1874–1958), Scottish geologist *Jim Begg (1920–1987), Scottish footballer ==See also== *James Beggs (disambiguation) *James "Beg" Stewart
title: James Begg (disambiguation)
